title: Getting Started as a Commercial Mortgage Broker
description:
Peter J. Gineris "Getting Started as a Commercial Mortgage Broker: How to Get to a Six-Figure Salary in 12 Months"
Wiley | 2008-12-03 | ISBN: 0470246537 | 208 pages | PDF | 2,1 MB

Make Real Money, Real Fast
Getting Started as a Commercial Mortgage Broker is the ultimate guide to making big money in no time at all. If you're currently struggling in the residential lending business or you're looking for a new career with six-figure potential, Peter Gineris will show you how to get started in your spare time and start making a bundle. Loaded with practical guidance and real-world real estate wisdom, this comprehensive,detailed guide shows you how to:
Start lending as a profitable side business
Find the right broker or lender to partner with
Get the proper training and understand your responsibilities as a broker
